languages.text: {n}Вы смотрите на дыру в адамантиумной переборке, сквозь которую выродки пробрались в склеп. Поразительно, что мутанты смогли пробить ее — для такого понадобилось бы поистине мощное промышленное оборудование, которое нельзя просто так собрать или украсть.{/n}

{n}You glance at the gaping hole in the adamantine bulkhead. It is almost unbelievable that the mutants were able to make a hole like that — they would have required truly powerful industrial equipment, and not the kind that can be easily assembled or stolen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы смотрите на дыру в адамантиумной переборке, сквозь которую выродки пробрались в склеп. Поразительно, что мутанты смогли пробить ее — для такого понадобилось бы поистине мощное промышленное оборудование, которое нельзя просто так собрать или украсть.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous jetez un coup d'œil au trou béant dans la cloison d'adamantine. Vous peinez à croire que les mutants aient pu faire une brèche de cette ampleur sans l'aide d'équipement industriel puissant, et pas le genre qui peut être facilement bricolé ou volé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You glance at the gaping hole in the adamantine bulkhead. It is almost unbelievable that the mutants were able to make a hole like that — they would have required truly powerful industrial equipment, and not the kind that can be easily assembled or stolen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous jetez un coup d'œil au trou béant dans la cloison d'adamantine. Vous peinez à croire que les mutants aient pu faire une brèche de cette ampleur sans l'aide d'équipement industriel puissant, et pas le genre qui peut être facilement bricolé ou volé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Echas un vistazo al enorme agujero en la mampara de adamantino. Es increíble que los mutantes consiguieran hacer un agujero como ese; tendrían que haber usado equipamiento industrial realmente potente, y no del que puede montarse ni robarse fácilmente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You glance at the gaping hole in the adamantine bulkhead. It is almost unbelievable that the mutants were able to make a hole like that — they would have required truly powerful industrial equipment, and not the kind that can be easily assembled or stolen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Echas un vistazo al enorme agujero en la mampara de adamantino. Es increíble que los mutantes consiguieran hacer un agujero como ese; tendrían que haber usado equipamiento industrial realmente potente, y no del que puede montarse ni robarse fácilmente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你瞥了一眼坚固舱壁上的大洞。这群变种人居然能打出这样的大洞，实在是让人难以置信。想要打出这样的大洞，需要威力相当强大的工业设备，靠那种随随便便就能偷走、组装起来的小玩意儿，是绝对不行的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You glance at the gaping hole in the adamantine bulkhead. It is almost unbelievable that the mutants were able to make a hole like that — they would have required truly powerful industrial equipment, and not the kind that can be easily assembled or stolen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你瞥了一眼坚固舱壁上的大洞。这群变种人居然能打出这样的大洞，实在是让人难以置信。想要打出这样的大洞，需要威力相当强大的工业设备，靠那种随随便便就能偷走、组装起来的小玩意儿，是绝对不行的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは頑強な隔壁にぽっかりと空いた穴に目をやった。変異体があのような穴を開けたのに、信じられない。強力な工業設備が必要なはずだ。安易に組み立てたり盗んだりできるようなものではない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You glance at the gaping hole in the adamantine bulkhead. It is almost unbelievable that the mutants were able to make a hole like that — they would have required truly powerful industrial equipment, and not the kind that can be easily assembled or stolen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは頑強な隔壁にぽっかりと空いた穴に目をやった。変異体があのような穴を開けたのに、信じられない。強力な工業設備が必要なはずだ。安易に組み立てたり盗んだりできるようなものではない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du blickst auf das klaffende Loch in dem Schott aus Adamant. Es ist schier unglaublich, dass die Mutanten ein solches Loch reißen konnten. Dafür hätten sie äußerst leistungsstarkes industrielles Gerät benötigt, und zwar nicht solches, das sich leicht zusammenbauen oder stehlen lässt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You glance at the gaping hole in the adamantine bulkhead. It is almost unbelievable that the mutants were able to make a hole like that — they would have required truly powerful industrial equipment, and not the kind that can be easily assembled or stolen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du blickst auf das klaffende Loch in dem Schott aus Adamant. Es ist schier unglaublich, dass die Mutanten ein solches Loch reißen konnten. Dafür hätten sie äußerst leistungsstarkes industrielles Gerät benötigt, und zwar nicht solches, das sich leicht zusammenbauen oder stehlen lässt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adamantin bölme panelindeki büyük deliğe gözün kayıyor. Mutantların böyle bir delik açmayı başarmış olmalarına inanması gerçekten güç. Çok güçlü endüstriyel ekipmanlara sahip olmaları gerekirdi. Bu tür şeyler de kolaylıkla üretilemez veya çalınamaz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You glance at the gaping hole in the adamantine bulkhead. It is almost unbelievable that the mutants were able to make a hole like that — they would have required truly powerful industrial equipment, and not the kind that can be easily assembled or stolen.{/n}
